Foods: Lean Proteins: Chicken, turkey, fish, tofu, and legumes to support muscle mass and keep you full.
Vegetables and Fruits: High in fiber and low in calories, they help with digestion and provide essential vitamins and minerals.
Whole Grains: Brown rice, quinoa, and oats to provide sustained energy and reduce cravings.
Healthy Fats: Avocados, nuts, seeds, and olive oil to support heart health and reduce inflammation.
Low-fat Dairy: Yogurt, milk, and cheese for calcium and protein.
Lifestyle: Regular Exercise: Combine cardio with strength training to burn calories and build muscle.
Portion Control: Focus on eating smaller, balanced meals more frequently throughout the day.
Hydration: Drink plenty of water to aid digestion and curb hunger.
Sleep: Ensure 7-8 hours of sleep per night to regulate metabolism and appetite.
Mindful Eating: Avoid distractions while eating and focus on enjoying your meals to prevent overeating.
